name: Unreel
description:
Unreel is a relaxing game where you collect strange dream fish, made for the 2022 Brackeys Game Jam.

By AvocadoSpud and Greenpixel

Controls :

Walk with arrow keys or WASD

Hold 'Space' to use your spear dash, aim with WASD or arrow keys.

Open the Journal with 'E'.

You can view your score in the pause menu with the Escape key.
